panels.title: System Overview
panels.description: Resource usage and key runtime counts.

panels.title: CPU Usage
panels.description: Process and host CPU utilization percentage.

panels.title: Memory Usage
panels.description: Working set usage compared to host capacity (GiB).

panels.title: Active Components
panels.description: Active sessions, WebSocket consumers, engine nodes, and loaded plugins.

panels.title: HTTP API Performance
panels.description: Request activity and responsiveness for the HTTP surface.

panels.title: HTTP Request Rate
panels.description: HTTP requests per second grouped by method.

panels.title: HTTP Status Mix
panels.description: Share of HTTP response codes over time.

panels.title: HTTP Latency Percentiles
panels.description: Rolling p50/p95/p99 latency derived from request duration histogram.

panels.title: Node Performance
panels.description: Execution performance across StreamKit engine nodes.

panels.title: Node Throughput (packets/sec)
panels.description: Aggregate packet send/receive rates across all nodes.

panels.title: Node Errors & Drops (per sec)
panels.description: Aggregate error and discard rates across all nodes.

panels.title: Top Nodes by Packets Sent (Total)
panels.description: Cumulative packets sent, showing only the top talkers.

panels.title: Node Runtime Duration (p95, p99)
panels.description: Node task runtime percentiles per node kind (measured from spawn until node exits). Long-lived dynamic sessions only emit these when sessions are destroyed/cleaned up.

panels.title: Node State (1=Running, 0=Other)
panels.description: Binary running state per node (1 = running).

panels.title: MoQ Transport Nodes
panels.description: MoQ subscriber/publisher/peer behaviour and health.

panels.title: MoQ Transport Throughput (packets/sec)
panels.description: Send and receive rates for MoQ subscriber/publisher/peer nodes.

panels.title: MoQ Transport Packets (Total)
panels.description: Total packets sent/received by each MoQ subscriber/publisher/peer node.

panels.title: MoQ Transport State
panels.description: Running state of each MoQ subscriber/publisher/peer node.

panels.title: SLOs
panels.description: High-signal latency and error-rate panels.

panels.title: HTTP Error Rate (API)
panels.description: HTTP error rate for /api/* endpoints (4xx and 5xx).

panels.title: HTTP Latency (API, 2xx)
panels.description: p95/p99 latency for successful /api/* requests (2xx only).

panels.title: Oneshot Pipeline Latency (ok)
panels.description: p95/p99 runtime for oneshot pipeline executions (status=ok). Samples are emitted when a oneshot pipeline finishes (long-running jobs won't appear until completion).

panels.title: Oneshot Pipeline Error Rate
panels.description: Percentage of oneshot pipeline executions that end with status=error. Samples are emitted when a oneshot pipeline finishes.

panels.title: Pin Distributor (Routing)
panels.description: Packet fan-out routing performance and backpressure at the output-pin distributor layer.

panels.title: Pin Distributor Backpressure Wait (p95, p99)
panels.description: p95/p99 of time spent blocked on downstream capacity in output-pin distributors (synchronized backpressure).

panels.title: Pin Distributor Outputs Active
panels.description: Active downstream outputs per distributor. Sum = total fan-out edges; max = most fanned-out single output pin.

title: StreamKit Performance Dashboard
description: Operational overview of StreamKit runtime health and throughput.
